moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target frozen.

moves.name: Ancient Power
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of raising the user’s Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed.

moves.name: Stone-Cold Endurance!
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def. Makes the user able to endure the next hit it takes that would reduce it to 0 HP.

moves.name: Haze
moves.effect: Returns raised stats of all opposing sync pairs to normal.

syncMove.name: Lights, Camera, Ice Shard
syncMove.description: The power of this move is increased if none of the opponent’s stats are raised.

passives.name: Snow Shelter
passives.description: Protects the Pokémon from damage from a hailstorm.

passives.name: Healing Hail 1
passives.description: Restores the Pokémon’s HP whenever it takes an action during a hailstorm.
